text: The 1930 Maryland gubernatorial election was held on November 4, 1930. Incumbent Democrat Albert Ritchie defeated Republican nominee William Frederick Broening with 55.96% of the vote. ==General election== ===Candidates=== Major party candidates *Albert Ritchie, Democratic *William Frederick Broening, Republican Other candidates *Elisabeth Gilman, Socialist *Robert W. Stevens, Independent *Samuel Parker, Communist ===Results=== ==References== 1930 Maryland Gubernatorial
title: 1930 Maryland gubernatorial election
